message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $9,500.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $8,000?

Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $9,000. This is my best compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate the effort, but I still believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Would you consider selling the product for $8,500?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $8,500 yet. I'm willing to make another concession, so I'll counteroffer at $9,200. This is my final compromise, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I understand your position, but I believe we can still work towards a better agreement. Could you consider selling the product for $8,800?

Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $9,000, but I'm not going any lower. I'm making a final counteroffer at $9,000, and I expect you to take it.
Alice, thank you for your final offer. I appreciate your efforts to meet me halfway. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a purchase price of $8,700.

Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too close to the original price I had in mind. I'm willing to make one last push, so I'll counteroffer at $9,200. This is my absolute limit, and I expect you to take it.
Alice, I've given this matter considerable thought, and I would like to propose a final offer of $8,600 for the product.
